document.full_text: israel is considering building an artificial island with sea and air ports off blockaded gaza, as a long-term solution to shipping goods into the hamas-run palestinian enclave, the transport minister said.
document.title: israeli minister proposes gaza artificial island
lines_and_colors: israel is considering building an artificial island with sea and air ports off blockaded gaza, as a long-term solution to shipping goods into the hamas-run palestinian enclave, the transport minister said.
